name: Freshsales Integration for WordPress
author: Smackcoders

sections.description:
Elevate your WordPress website to a new level of lead capture and CRM integration with the Freshsales Integration for WordPress plugin. Say goodbye to complex HTML forms and visible public IDs. With WP Freshsales, you can create, manage, and update web forms using dynamic shortcodes, enabling you to embed them anywhere in your WordPress content, from posts and pages to custom posts, sidebars, widgets, and popups. Ensure security with built-in Captcha protection to combat spam effectively.

Note: WP Freshsales is now a part of the WP Leads Builder for any CRM plugin, encompassing Freshsales CRM, Salesforce, Vtiger, Zoho, and SugarCRM integration features.

With WP Freshsales, you can:

  • Generate web forms without the need for HTML or visible public IDs.
  • Create dynamic shortcodes for use anywhere in your WordPress content.
  • Streamline form updates with a single shortcode edit.
  • Easily set up fields by pulling them from Freshsales CRM modules.
  • Customize form elements effortlessly through a user-friendly interface.
  • Assign forms to available Freshsales users for efficient lead management.

In essence, WP Freshsales empowers you to generate web forms via a user-friendly CRM WordPress plugin interface, turning your website’s visitors into high-potential leads for Freshsales CRM.

Key Features

  • Generate Freshsales WordPress forms with or without web forms.
  • Seamlessly integrate with the Contact Form 7 plugin, offering a familiar user experience.
  • Utilize Freshsales WordPress plugin forms in pages, posts, popups, opt-ins, and widgets.
  • Capture potential leads and sync them with Freshsales CRM.
  • Easily redirect users to the desired page after form submission.
  • Receive notifications on lead capture success or failure.
  • Convert new users into CRM leads with Freshsales plugins.

Elevate your lead capture game and streamline your CRM integration with Freshsales Integration for WordPress. Transform your website into a lead-generating powerhouse effortlessly.

Upgrading to Pro

Take your lead capture and CRM integration to the next level by upgrading to the Leads Builder for CRM Pro. With the Pro version, you’ll unlock an array of enhanced features:

  • Full Freshsales CRM Support: Seamlessly integrate with Freshsales CRM to enhance your lead management and customer data.

  • Salesforce, Vtiger, Zoho, and SugarCRM Integration: Extend your reach by integrating with Salesforce, Vtiger, Zoho, and SugarCRM, offering comprehensive CRM solutions for your business.

  • Advanced Features: Access advanced tools and features that will supercharge your lead capture and CRM operations, including customization options, automation, and more.

Upgrade to the Pro version today and transform your WordPress website into a lead generation and CRM powerhouse with WP Freshsales.

Other Useful Plugins & Addons By Smackcoders

To Import and Export WordPress Data as CSV or XML
and for premium version of the plugin, you can get it here

The Leads Builder for WordPress to capture your webforms as leads to one of the top ranking open source CRM, install the WordPress Lead Form Data Collection to CRM Plugin. Install one of the CRM of your choice with the additional add-ons listed below and keep both parent plugin and CRM addon activated.
* Zoho CRM & Zoho CRM Plus
* Salesforce
* SugarCRM
* Vtiger CRM

To know more about the premium bundled version, visit WordPress Lead Form Data Collection to CRM with unlimited features

Helpful links

Visit Smackcoders to explore more WordPress products. You can write to us your comments, feedback at support@smackcoders.com

Get to know about other WordPress addons and latest product update news at www.smackcoders.com/blogs.html
sections.installation:
1. First, install CRM WordPress Leads
  2. Then Extract the wp-freshsales.zip in wordpress/wp-content/plugins using FTP or through plugin install in wp-admin.
  3. Activate the plugin in the WordPress plugin list.
sections.changelog:
2.1

  • Checked: Compatibility for WordPress 6.3.2
  • Checked: Latest Freshsales Compatibility
  • Improved: User Interface

2.0.2

  • Checked: Compatibility for WordPress 6.0.2

2.0.1

  • Checked: Compatibility for WordPress 6.0.1

2.0

  • Upgrade now for latest updates.

1.0.7

  • Updated: Freshsales PHP API

1.0.6

  • Added: Compatibility for WordPress 5.8.2
  • Fixed: Freshsales Configuration Page UI Issue.

1.0.5

  • Added: Compatibility for WordPress 5.6
  • Added: PHP 8 compatibility

1.0.4

  • Modified : Activated addon slug.

1.0.3

  • Added : WP CSRF Protection.

1.0.2

  • Fixed : Freshsales Credential Validation Issue.
  • Added : Leads Builder Pro Banner.

1.0.1

  • Checked: Compatibility for WordPress 5.3.2

1.0

  • Initial stable release version.
